name: European Forum of Muslim Women
goal:
At EFOMW, we aim to promote human rights, equality and solidarity and contribute to more inclusive societies. We mainly focus on the intersectional discriminations faced by Muslim women, the different challenges of Muslim Women in Europe and the ways to tackle and eliminate them. As
such our activities are mainly advocacy and policy based, while we do have another important component which is about building the capacities of our member organisations: grassroots organisations, led by muslim women and that are in direct contact with muslim women on the ground.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Anti-discrimination policies
Gender equality policies
Employment directive
Horizontal directive
FEMM-LIBE ongoing work
Istanbul convention ratification
ARDI amendments
Work against Anti-muslim work done at EC and EP
